summary: Replaces vanilla quiver (Bloodcursed/Sunhallowed Elven Arrow) with a new model
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/cmeqtyp1uba0t47kp.png[/img]


[youtube]jwKrJtFnYT8[/youtube]

[b]Auriel's Crossbow and Swords out now![/b]
[img]http://666kb.com/i/cmz0mjlrc2nag2be8.jpg[/img]
MOD: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52445/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52445/[/url]
[/center]


User requested mod:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1475485-auriels-quiver/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1475485-auriels-quiver/[/url]

Replaced meshes:
- Bloodcursed Elven Arrow quiver
- Sunhallowed Elven Arrow quiver

Replaces vanilla quiver with a new mesh. Uses vanilla textures of Auriel's Bow and Shield. Two versions:
1) Replacer, works with retextures of bow/shield.
2) Replacer including textures - looks same as first version but changed the texture (paths)

Download version 1 by default if you're using vanilla bow/shield OR just modded textures that fit the quiver. Download version 2 if you're using modded bow/shield retextures that would look out of place on the quiver.

Just unpack the archive to ...|Skyrim|Data| , folder structure should look like:
|data|meshes|dlc01|weapons|auriel| .NIF FILES

[b]Dawnguard required![/b]



[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/cmeqqdagk0e2iv3a1.png[/img][/center]

Random Guy: But i want a standalone version !
Answer: Nah, we have to get rid of that boring reused model and save an .esp slot.

Random Guy: But this is not the most amazing replacer !
Answer: Yes, you're totally right.

Random Guy: But...but i want Auriel's Dagger, Sword, Armor and *nal Plug !
Answer: Okay.

Random Guy: But the lore tells us...
Answer: But I'm telling you...

Random Guy: When will you update this mod? This quiver needs a custom race and city, an own questline and...
Answer: When the sun rises in the west and sets in the east, when the rivers run dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves. When my womb quickens again, and I bear a living child. Then i will update it, my sun-and-stars, and not before !

Bethesda: THX!
Ghosu: NP!

Random Guy: If you change/add that, i will give you an endorse! But only maybe!
Answer: Ah, no need good sir. I really don't derserve your blessing!

Nerd: I studied the Lore of Auriel's Quiver for 5 decades. This doesn't look right!
Answer: Sorry.

Auriel: This doesn't look right!
Answer: Not you again. GET THE F*CK OUT OF HERE!

Random Guy: How to obtain the arrows?
Answer: The same way you got them before you installed this mod.

Random Guy: WTF? Dawnguard required ???
Answer: Yes.

Random Guy: Skyrim required?
Answer: No.

Random Guy: This Quiver needs a quest to make it special...or at least a story.
Answer: You're right. Once there was a quiver and it hovered on your back. There you go.

Pirate: Arrrrr, this mod doesn't work !
Answer: Man overboard !

Random Guy: This mod needs more...
Bruce Dickinson: COWBELL !

Random Guy: Is this SkyRe compatible?
Answer: OF COURSE...like all other MESH replacer...and OF COURSE it's compatible with Dual Sheath Redux and fantasy music replacer as well!

Random Guy: Calling me "Random Guy" is discriminating, you would be NOTHING without me!
Answer: True. Of course. Shame on me.

That guy in the comment section: Will there be a Proper Length Arrows compatible version?
Ghosu: No !
*a few minutes later*
Ghosu: Proper Length Arrows compatible version added.

Random Guy: Why Gordon Ramsay ?
Answer: Why not ?!

Random Guy: But Ghosu, i thought you're making a modding break ?!
Answer: I'm addicted.

Random Guy: ... excellent ! So here are my requests !
Answer: I don't think so.

Random Guy via PM: Hi Ghosu! I REALLY love your mods and you're the best modder EVER. I know that you're not taking requests atm, so here is my request!
Answer: Come on, REALLY ?!

Random Guy: TL,DR. This FAQ...IT's TOO LONG!
Answer: I hear that quite often.

[center]
[b]Credits: Thanks to Gordon Ramsay,Bear Grylls and Tywin Lannister for your support, you made me a better person.[/b]

[/center]
